hopobject.name: elinux-tcl
hopobject.pname: Embedded Linux Library for Total Control Lighting
hopobject.body: This C library comes with example code for driving coolneon.com's Total Control Lighting. A fully programmable 3-color LED system based on the p9813 chip. The strands are run through an SPI compatible protocol. The library requires that the kernel be compiled for user space SPI using the spidev kernel module.
hopobject.shortdesc: A C library for driving Total Control Lighting 3 color LED strands (based on the p9813 chip) using SPI on single-board Linux computers such as the BeagleBone or BeagleBoard.
